parameter.name: Script
parameter.val: #name "DrikaTest" #participants 1 send_character_message 1 "set_dialogue_control true" set_character_pos 1 3.40671 -1.7413 2.74886 90 set_cam 5.23349 -1.29878 3.74276 0 40.24 0 90 send_character_message 1 "set_animation \"Data/Animations/drika_lever_pull.anm\"" send_level_message "open_door" say 1 "Turner" "Open the door." send_character_message 1 "set_dialogue_control false"
